enable-fd.help: Enable CAN flexible data rate (not compatible with CAN2.0a/b

sid-filter-count.help: Configure the number of standard (11-bit ID) filters

xid-filter-count.help: Configure the number of extended (29-bit ID) filters

rx0-fifo-size.help: Number of CAN messages that can fit in RX0FIFO, the unfiltered message FIFO in the TCAN's internal memory

rx1-fifo-size.help: Number of CAN messages that can fit in RX1FIFO, the filtered message FIFO in the TCAN's internal memory

unfiltered-buffer-size.help: Number of CAN messages that can fit in the unfiltered message buffer

filtered-buffer-size.help: Number of CAN messages that can fit in EACH filter's message buffer
